channel.title: CVE Feed for A WP Life -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for A WP Life -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23646|2024-10-07T15:11:25.986Z -- a%20wp%20life -- album%20gallery%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20gallery
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in A WP Life Album Gallery – WordPress Gallery plugin <= 1.4.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-35720|2024-08-02T03:14:53.919Z -- a%20wp%20life -- album%20gallery%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20gallery
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in A WP Life Album Gallery – WordPress Gallery.This issue affects Album Gallery – WordPress Gallery: from n/a through 1.5.7.
